package.name: florianbelhomme/foundation-bundle
package.description: Integrates the features of the responsive framework Foundation, from Zurb, into Symfony2 by providing templates, Twig extensions, services and commands.

dev-master.name: florianbelhomme/foundation-bundle
dev-master.description: Integrates the features of the responsive framework Foundation, from Zurb, into Symfony2 by providing templates, Twig extensions, services and commands.

suggest.knplabs\/knp-paginator-bundle: FoundationBundle can styles the pagination provided by KnpPaginatorBundle.
suggest.knplabs\/knp-menu-bundle: FoundationBundle can styles the menus provided by KnpMenuBundle.
suggest.white-october\/pagerfanta-bundle: FoundationBundle can styles the pagination provided by PagerFanta.
suggest.flob\/foundation-demo-bundle: Provides you a demo and examples of the features of the foundation bundle.
